channel.title: Error connecting, Help please!
channel.description: Everytime I try to log onto my client I enter my info etc etc and then it says "Error connecting to server." What do I have to do to make me be able to login. Help me please! my server is 317 client and base

item.title: Error connecting, Help please!
item.dc:creator: @im_winner im winner
item.description:
@im_winner wrote:

[quote=“moerin, post:2, topic:370289”]Put your server online.

  • you have to portforwarding.
    When you done that, make a No-ip ip.
    Then you have to download the No-ip dock (search on Google)

And if you have done that all, and if it’s not even working use another source and client.[/quote]I have made a No-ip but I don’t really understand the Port Fowarding part, do you think you can TV me?

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting, Help please!
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

Put your server online.

  • you have to portforwarding.
    When you done that, make a No-ip ip.
    Then you have to download the No-ip dock (search on Google)

And if you have done that all, and if it’s not even working use another source and client.

Read full topic
